segments.text: Yes , she does . She works at home .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I understand . She cooks , cleans and takes care of children . Is that right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , no . Most of the time I do these things . She is a writer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are really a hen-pecked husband .
segments.speaker: S1
